clues.text: Speared by St. George in Raphael's famous work
Gainsborough masterpiece painted to disprove theory that masses of blue ruin a composition

He was a financier before leaving civilization & settling in the South Seas

This popular offshoot of soccer evolved after Harvard insisted upon playing "The Boston Game"
In golf, a "whiff" means you've done this to the ball
4 horses died & only 9 of 29 finished in England's 1954 Grand National, this kind of race

Brazil fought on this side
In 1944, this country was hit by 650,000 tons of bombs

City in which De Gaulle established the Provisional Nat'l Committee of the Free French in 1940
There are 3 Es in this verb meaning to come into view or rise from water
"Cease" has 5 letters; this word that's paired with it in a legal term has 6
The stock markets love this word that can mean, among other things, spend time on & give power to
The "P" is not silent at the end of this verb meaning to get back your losses
As a means of making amends, it's sometimes done to "the beef"

rounds.comments: (Ken: Each response is two automakers smushed together and linked by one shared letter.)

clues.text: The maker of the Navigator collides with the maker of the Sentra

rounds.text: Number of stars on the U.S. flag which served the longest
